author: Parsifal-2045
body: #### PR description: This PR adds a few more entries to the list of framework signals tracked by the `FastTimerService`. In particular there are two main changes: - Introduce a new `Cleanup` category to measure the resources used/freed between `preClearEvent` and `postClearEvent`. This time was previously assigned to overhead since the signals are called between the end of an Event and the beginning of the next one - Add support for `Transform` signals called by heterogenous module consuming a portable collection needing a host-device transformation. The effects of these changes can be seen in the following plots: - CPU: [Baseline](https://lferragi.web.cern.ch/timing/fastTimerServiceNewSignals/piechart.php?colours=default&data_name=data&dataset=baselineCPU_16j_16t_16s&groups=hlt&local=false&resource=time_real&show_labels=true&show_animations=true&threshold=0) | [This PR](https://lferragi.web.cern.ch/timing/fastTimerServiceNewSignals/piechart.php?colours=default&data_name=data&dataset=newSignalsCPU_16j_16t_16s&groups=hlt&local=false&resource=time_real&show_labels=true&show_animations=true&threshold=0) :-------------------------:|:-------------------------: | - GPU: [Baseline](https://lferragi.web.cern.ch/timing/fastTimerServiceNewSignals/piechart.php?colours=default&data_name=data&dataset=baselineGPU_16j_16t_16s&groups=hlt&local=false&resource=time_real&show_labels=true&show_animations=true&threshold=0) | [This PR](https://lferragi.web.cern.ch/timing/fastTimerServiceNewSignals/piechart.php?colours=default&data_name=data&dataset=newSignalsGPU_16j_16t_16s&groups=hlt&local=false&resource=time_real&show_labels=true&show_animations=true&threshold=0) :-------------------------:|:-------------------------: | #### PR validation: Technical change with no physics impact, results validated in the plots shown above (and hopefully reproducible by the bot)
title: [NGT] Add support for more signals in the `FastTimerService`
